column5: Located in the prestigouos Avalon at Seven Meadows gated community. Our place is close to Katy Mills Mall and the Energy Corridor. Minutes away from Citycenter and The Galleria Mall. Numerous dining options for all budgets. It is a waterfront property with a great view. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
column8: Private room in waterfront home in Katy.
